```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
```



```{r, echo = FALSE}
data(nyc_airbnb) 
nyc_airbnb = nyc_airbnb %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(rating = review_scores_location/2) %>%
  rename(borough = neighbourhood_group) %>%
  select(borough, neighbourhood, latitude, longitude, room_type, price, rating) %>%
  filter(!is.na(rating),
         price %in% 100:500
         )
```

Column{data-width = 500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Price and Rating by Location

```{r, echo = FALSE}
nyc_airbnb  %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Price: $", price, '\nRating: ', rating, '\nBorough: ', borough)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~longitude, y = ~latitude, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5, 
          color = ~price,
          text = ~text_label)
```

Column{data-width = 500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Rating Distribution by Borough

```{r, echo = FALSE}
nyc_airbnb %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~rating, color = ~borough, type = "box")
```

### Number of 5-Star Airbnbs in Brooklyn by Neighbourhood

```{r, echo = FALSE}
nyc_airbnb %>%
  filter(rating == 5, borough == "Brooklyn") %>%
  count(neighbourhood) %>%
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, n)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~neighbourhood, y = ~n, color = ~neighbourhood, type = "bar")
```
